gog.com zgleda zapira vrata:   Dear GOG users,  We have recently had to give serious thought to whether we could really keep GOG.com the way it is. We've debated on it for quite some time and, unfortunately, we've decided that GOG.com simply cannot remain in its current form.  We're very grateful for all support we've received from all of you in the past two years. Working on GOG.com was a great adventure for all of us and an unforgettable journey to the past, through the long and wonderful history of PC gaming.  This doesn't mean the idea behind GOG.com is gone forever. We're closing down the service and putting this era behind us as new challenges await.  On a technical note, this week we'll put in place a solution to allow everyone to re-download their games. Stay tuned to this page and follow us on Twitter and Facebook for updates.  All the best, GOG.com Team  lahko pa je le publicity stunt :P.

Se mi je sedaj posvetilo! Kak mesec od tega sem končal Heavy Rain za PS3 in mi je nonstop podzavest govorila, da me zelo spominja na nekaj kar sem že igral... In seveda je Quantic Dream razvil tudi Indigo Prophecy (ki, je, btw, veliko boljša igra od Heavy Rain, čeprav sta nekako po istem kopitu). Drugače jaz trenutno berem eno zanimivo knjigo o zgodovini videoiger, "Dungeons and Dreamers" kjer se omenja tudi serija "tekstualnih avantur" iz zgodnjih osemdesetih prejšnjega stoletja naslovljena ZORK. V bistvu gre za eno prvih predelav namizne igre Dungeons and Dragons za računalnik. Pa sem si ZORK ubodel na gog.com za $5.99 Za prenosnik, na kateremu rad igram klasične point and click avanture in rpgje. :)

Jezst sem leta nazaj v nekem packu dobil Return to Zork, pa je prvo nisem znal usposobit z zvokom, potem ko pa mi je uspelo, pa zadeve nisem znal igrat. Vmes sem nato igral Broken Sword, ki je bil povsem drugačna zadeva in bistveno lažja za skapirat. Čeprav je Zork imel nek svoj čar, ki ga niti ne moreš opisat. Vsaj za tistih par korakov, ki mi jih je uspelo narediti v igri. Mogoče se bom zdej spravil še enkrat igrat, ko bolj obvladam angleško pa nekaj gaming zgodovine imam že za sabo...
